predicate.note: Frames file for 'alter' based on sentences in financial subcorpus. Verbnet entries other_cos-45.4 turn-26.6, other framed members include decrease, halt, narrow, shut, slow, sweeten, weaken; convert. Comparison to 'change'.

roleset.name: transform

example.name: just transitive
example.text: But although the golden share has been waived, a hostile bidder for Jaguar would still have *trace* to alter the British concern's articles of association which ban shareholdings of more than 15%.
example.arg: the British concern's articles of association which ban shareholdings of more than 15%

example.name: with start and end points
example.text: John's dismal performance on the spelling exam altered him from a happy-go-lucky student to a bitter enraged punk.
example.arg: John's dismal performance on the spelling exam

roleset.note: I actually doubt start and end points will occur, but there they are anyway.
